channel.title: [SHARD] Smudge-Pkz V1 [SHARD]
channel.description:
[b]BASE USED: SHARD[/b] [b]YOU MUST USE GOOGLES CLIENT TO OPEN WYSONS SHOP! Download the client [url=http://uppit.com/A2B7ID] HERE [/url][/b] I DID NOT MAKE THE CLIENT, 100% CREDIT TO HIM FOR THE CLIENT!
Not many shard servers or tutorials, so it's very basic and not much in it but some features that I added:
Greeter is Turael, uses dialogue Donnie is some funny dialogue, was testing, you can see in pics added command ::train, you train attack on dummies (It's not really fast, I was mostly testing with this command) Altered XP Rate (About 2k a hit?) Added "pwnage shop" for higher levels Added zammy monks with drops Added drops for cows
Not many updates I know.. But everything was trial and error, I used NO TUTORIALS AT ALL! So I guess I did semi-good.
Well enough talk.. Picture time!
[b]WORKING DIALOGUE![/b] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/vsonjr.jpg[/img]
[b]EXP RATE:[/b] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/11l37dw.jpg[/img]
[b]CUSTOM MADE SHOP:[/b] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2dhw7zq.jpg[/img]
[b]CUSTOM ::TRAIN COMMAND:[/b] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/308jxcp.jpg[/img]
[b]CUSTOM ZAMMY WIZARDS AREA![/b] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/b7n9ee.jpg[/img]
Alright, if you liked it, DOWNLOAD IT! Download it [url=http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?nytihhmxnku] [b][size=20pt]HERE[/size][/b][/url]
But remember, I didn't use an tutorials or any kind of snippets, I just played around with it and only got a few errors. That was my first attempt at a shard server, and I have to say, It's pretty damn good/stable. I made a small basic shard tutorial in the tutorial section, but I don't know if it will approve or not.
Thanks, again, download it here: http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?nytihhmxnku
Creds: 35% Shard Revolution for base 65% me for coding some stuff and releasing :D
Other Creds: 100% Google for the client

25% Shard Revolution for base
75% me for coding some stuff and releasing Big Grin
[/quote]

You added a few shops, commands, and some dialogues, and then you take 75 % of the credit?[/quote]

Be happy I gave him some credit… some people just put like 10%. And, I don’t know how to do much in Shard, as I stated, so I believe is should be around 25

EDIT: Im working on more… I will release a v2
EDIT 2: Ok, fine, I gave him 10 more and took away 10 from mine. I’ll be adding myself more once I make more stuff.

item.title: [SHARD] Smudge-Pkz V1 [SHARD]
item.dc:creator: @pk3r_john pk3r john
item.description:
@pk3r_john wrote:

BASE USED: SHARD
YOU MUST USE GOOGLES CLIENT TO OPEN WYSONS SHOP! Download the client HERE
I DID NOT MAKE THE CLIENT, 100% CREDIT TO HIM FOR THE CLIENT!

Not many shard servers or tutorials, so it’s very basic and not much in it but some features that I added:

Greeter is Turael, uses dialogue
Donnie is some funny dialogue, was testing, you can see in pics
added command ::train, you train attack on dummies (It’s not really fast, I was mostly testing with this command)
Altered XP Rate (About 2k a hit?)
Added “pwnage shop” for higher levels
Added zammy monks with drops
Added drops for cows

Not many updates I know… But everything was trial and error, I used NO TUTORIALS AT ALL! So I guess I did semi-good.

Well enough talk… Picture time!

WORKING DIALOGUE!

EXP RATE:

11l37dw.jpg760×455

CUSTOM MADE SHOP:

CUSTOM ::TRAIN COMMAND:

CUSTOM ZAMMY WIZARDS AREA!

Alright, if you liked it, DOWNLOAD IT!
Download it [size=20pt]HERE[/size]

But remember, I didn’t use an tutorials or any kind of snippets, I just played around with it and only got a few errors. That was my first attempt at a shard server, and I have to say, It’s pretty damn good/stable. I made a small basic shard tutorial in the tutorial section, but I don’t know if it will approve or not.

Thanks, again, download it here: http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?nytihhmxnku

Creds:
35% Shard Revolution for base
65% me for coding some stuff and releasing

Other Creds:
100% Google for the client
